channel.title: Item bonuses?
channel.description: Plz don't call me dumb cause i have an awesome server i just don't know how to do this. How do i make items give u bonuses, like under attack bonuses the stab:, the slash:, and stuff. Also i am wondering how to make it ask u if u are running silabsoft when u log in. Help is greatly appreciated.

item.title: Item bonuses?
item.dc:creator: @The_roy6 The roy6
item.description:
@The_roy6 wrote:

Go to Item.cfg

Find the item u want and change the numbers…pretty much…

Read full topic
